title: Language Project-Based Education Utilizing Multimedia Multimodal Expression Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Foundational Language Learning Competencies
context.additional_context: Improving language expression skills through multimedia material production and collaboration in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create interactive multimedia materials on given topics using tools such as images, audio, and video.
Learners can complete project outcomes combining verbal and non-verbal expressions through collaboration with peers.
Learners can reproduce language expressions learned in a digital environment with over 80% accuracy in assessments conducted three months later.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
